action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the limitation on the amount individuals can deduct for certain State and local taxes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the SALT Fairness and Marriage Penalty Elimination Act.

section.header: Modification of limitation on deduction for certain State and local taxes of individuals

subsection.text: Section 164(b)(6)(B) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking shall not exceed $10,000 ($5,000 in the case of a married individual filing a separate return). and inserting

clause.text: except as provided in clause (ii), $100,000, and
in the case of a joint return, $200,000.

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
